title: [feature request] Low-discrepancy quasi-random sampler (Sobol sequences)
body_html:
It would be nice to have a native low-discrepancy quasi-random sampler available in pytorch (for things like qMC numerical integration etc.).

Ideally that would be implemented on a low-level in ATen, and have a convenience constructor on the python side (not sure exactly where that would live).

I have cython code for a Sobol generator with Owen scrambling that I'd be willing to port over for this, provided if that would be of interest.

It would be nice to have a native low-discrepancy quasi-random sampler available in pytorch (for things like qMC numerical integration etc.).

Ideally that would be implemented on a low-level in ATen, and have a convenience constructor on the python side (not sure exactly where that would live).
